info.name: Route Mobile WhatsApp Business Messaging API

item.name: Template API
item.description:
## API details:   This API is used to generate Static UPI/Bharat QR. The QR generated via this API is interoperable, can be used by any UPI applications like Gpay, Phonepe etc, and these QR codes can be used for accepting multiple transactions where customer can select the desired amount by themselves before making the payment.   ## API Request Details   | Key     | Mandatory/Conditional | Refer only for Conditional | |---------|----------------------|----------------------------| | key     | Mandatory            | -                          | | command | Mandatory            | -                          | | hash    | Mandatory            | -                          | | var1    | Mandatory            | -                          |   ## Var1 Field Breakdown:   var1 is a JSON string consisting of a set of mandatory and non-mandatory keys that define the transaction and user details:

  |*Key*    |*Data Type*    |*Mandatory/Conditional/Optional*     |*Description*     |*Sample*    | |--------|-----|-------------------|---------------|-------| |`customerId`|string (alphanumeric)|C|Merchant Transaction Identifier. Should be unique & alphanumeric special (less than or equal to 20 characters & Only "@", ".", "," are allowed)|1234abcd|-| |`merchantVpa`|string|C|Merchant's VPA in which payment will be collected.VPA to be embedded in QR. Should be unique & alphanumeric special (less than or equal to 50 characters & Only "@", ".", "," are allowed)| instadummy.001@hdfcbank|-| |`name`|string|O|Customer details, to be embedded in QR (less than or equal to 20 characters).If not sent, merchant’s name registered during the onboarding process will be used.|Test User|-| |`city`|String|O|Customer details, to be embedded in QR (less than or equal to 15 characters).If not sent, merchant’s city registered during the onboarding process will be used|Gurgaon|-| |`pinCode`|string|O|Customer details, to be embedded in the QR(less than or equal to 10 characters). If not sent, merchant’s pincode registered during the onboarding process will be used.|122001|-| |`instaProduct`|string|M|QR generation flag. Fixed value - qr|qr|-| |`address`|String|O|Customer address(less than or equal to 100 characters).|Payu, Bestech Business Tower, Gurgaon|-| |`udf1` - `udf5`|string|O|udf1, udf2, udf3, udf4 and udf5 can be sent in request to include any transactional information.|-|-| |`outputType`|string|O|outputType can be '', 'string' and 'base64'. By default, base64 json encoded qrSting in response is sent.|string|-| |`submerchantRegistration`|string|O|submerchantRegistration can be '1'or '0'. If '1' is passed than the request is passed to the acquiring bank and if '0' is passed the request is processed internally at PayU end.|1 or 0|-| |`mebussname`|string|C|mebussname needs to be passed only if submerchantRegisteration is passed as '1',mebussname will be visible to the customers u[on scanning this QR.|PayU|-| |`strCntMobile`|string|C|strCntMobile needs to be passed only if submerchantRegisteration is passed as '1',this will be the phone number associated for the entity for whom VPA is being created.|9833270176|-| |`panNo`|string|C|panNo needs to be passed only if submerchantRegisteration is passed as '1',this will be the pan number associated for the entity for whom VPA is being created.|BPEPK5437G|-| |`legalStrName`|string|C|legalStrName needs to be passed only if submerchantRegisteration is passed as '1',this will be the legal name associated for the entity for whom VPA is being created.|PayU payments pvt ltd|-| |`awlmcc`|string|C|awlmcc needs to be passed only if submerchantRegisteration is passed as '1', Merchant Category code as per NPCI guidelines needs to be passed which is typically a numeric value of length = 4.|7999|-|   > *Sample var1*: {​​​​"name":"Test Live test","merchantVpa":"qr.6879729.prod12@indus","qrType":"upi","city":"South West","pinCode":"122002","address":"sector 46","udf5":"BFL113","instaProduct":"qr","submerchantRegistration":"1","mebussname":"Sltest1","outputType":"string","awlmcc":"7999","legalStrName":"Testaly","panNo":"BPEPK5437G","strCntMobile":"9833270176"}​​​​   ## Success Response Structure: For every success response based on outputType param:
  |OutputType    |  Description  |  Sample       | |--------------|---------------|---------------| |string|Qr String is plain text will be returned in response along with QR ID & VPA associated to the QR, the QR string can be converted into image and used for accepting transactions |"qrString": "upi://pay?pa=bfltestqr.6879729.prod12@indus&pn=BFL%20Live%20test&mc=7999&tr=STQ9ssiL2MJTZ76879729&ver=01&mode=01&orgid=000000&qrMedium=04&cu=INR&pinCode=122002","qrId": "STQ9ssiL2MJTZ76879729","merchantVpa": "bfltestqr.6879729.prod12@indus"| |base64|Base 64 encoded string  will be returned in response along with QR ID & VPA associated to the QR, the encoded string provides a layer of security which can be eventually converted into image and used for accepting transactions|"qrString": "data:image/png;base64,",     "qrId": "STQ9vDy3i7dEW6136226",     "merchantVpa": "instadummy.001@hdfcbank" }​​​​|   ## Failed Response Structure: For every failed request, a JSON response is sent with key as status, message, and error code.
  |*Status*    |*Message*    |*Error Code*     | |--------|-----|-------------------| ||Command name is empty|if it is invalid, an HTML page is shown| ||Merchant key is empty|if it is invalid, an HTML page is shown| ||Hash is empty|if it is invalid, an HTML page is shown| |failed|"customerId and VPA both cannot be empty"|E2054| |failed|customerId length is longer than 20|E2072| |failed|Invalid customerId|E2013| |failed|customerId or VPA should be unique|E2013| |failed|merchantVpa length is longer than 50|E2072| |failed|VPA/AccountNo mismatch with customerId generated VPA/AccountNo|E2068| |failed|VPA/Account mismatch with VPA/Account series configured. Please contact your account manage|E2067| |failed|qrName length is longer than 20|E2072| |failed|city length is longer than 15|E2011| |failed|pinCode length is longer than 10|E2072| |failed|address length is longer than 100|E2072| |failed|UDF1 length is longer than 255|E2072| |failed|UDF2 length is longer than 255|E2072| |failed|UDF3 length is longer than 255|E2072| |failed|UDF4 length is longer than 255|E2072| |failed|UDF5 length is longer than 255|E2072| |failed|PG Params are missing:[\"mastScheme\"]". Please contact your account manager|E2015| |failed|Payment option is disabled. Please contact your account manager|E2016| |failed|Invalid VPA/AccountNo series configured. Please contact your account manager|E2067| |failed|Unable to identify VPA/AccountNo series. Please contact your account manager|E2067| |failed|QR Generation Failed|E2013| |failed|Invalid submerchantRegistration|E2013| |failed|Invalid mebussname|E2013| |failed|strCntMobile length is longer than 10|E2072| |failed|Invalid strCntMobile|E2013| |failed|Invalid legalStrName|E2013| |failed|legalStrName length is longer than 90|E2072| |failed|Invalid awlmcc|E2013| |failed|awlmcc length is longer than 5|E2072| |failed|Invalid panNo|E2013| |failed|panNo length is longer than 10|E2072| |failed|VPA registration Failed|E2013|     > *Note* : * var1 is a json. All the sub fields are to be sent as a json in var1. Note that the whole json string should be used for hash generation. * name, city & pinCode are optional. The parameters are embedded in QR and is shown to the customer when he scans the QR for payment.   * In case the above mentioned optional details are not sent, we will use the details registered against the merchant during the on-boarding process. In case the details are not present at merchant level we will use PayU Payments Pvt. Ltd., Gurgaon & 122001 respectively.   * customerId should always be unique and different for every new QR request. The parameter should be alphanumericspecial (only “@”, “.” & “-” are allowed) & less than or equal to 20 characters.   * MerchantVpa should always be unique and different for every new QR request. The parameter should be alphanumericspecial (only “@”, “.” & “-” are allowed) & less than or equal to 50 characters.   * The response sent for QR generation request is json encoded and will be a base64 encoded string of the actual QR image, in case outputType is not shared   * To obtain the actual QR image, first decode the json encoded response and then convert the base64 encoded string to actual QR image.   * For every QR generation request, in the response we will share back the unique identifier, “qrId”, embedded in the QR & “merchantVpa”, embedded in the QR.   * Please map the QR image to this qrId & merchantVpa and also with respective customer/entity who will use this QR for making payments to you. This qrId or merchantVpa will be available at the time of transaction callback which you can use to identify the customer who made the payment.   * In some scenarios qrId will not be available in the transaction callback details. In such scenarios, please use the merchantVpa available (field4) in the transaction callback details to identify the customer who made the payment.   * The parameters udf1, udf2, udf3, udf4 & udf5 which are sent at the time of QR generation are recorded against every payment made on that QR. These parameters can be used to internally reconcile the payments at individual customer level & is the best possible way to reconcile payments for every transaction.   * Merchant VPA series should be configured against the merchant id before you start generating QR on production environment (not required in case subMerchantRegistration is sent as 1). Please check with your account manager & integration POC before you go live on production.   * In case real-time registration of sub-merchant is required, please pass the param subMerchantRegistration as 1. In this scenario, PayU will register the sub-merchant & VPA in real-time with bank & will accordingly generate the QR   * For real-time registration of sub-merchant, parameters such as mebussname, strCntMobile , panNo, legalStrName, awlmcc are mandatory parameters in the API request
